title: ‘We came, we saw, he died’ - Hillary Clinton on Gaddafi
content: After Gaddafi is snatched, he is loaded into a vehicle and taken to Sirte but arrives there already dead. The most widely circulated reaction to his death comes from then US Secretary of State Hillary Clinton. “We came, we saw, he died,” Clinton jokes with reporters, moments after finding out that Gaddafi was killed.
